runs.comm: leg-stump line, flicked through square leg
a wide outside the off stump. But he gets away with it...!
short, wide, slapped ... but he has a sweeper out on the boundary, Swann, whose influence on this game could be huge
a nasty one cutting back into the right hander. Good, straight delivery
cuts away this time, punched out to the off side for a sharp single. Good running, that. In fact - really super running
that's four! A cracking drive through extra cover is greeted with horns, whistling, cheering and general mayhem
oh well bowled! Beats the outside edge and that was pacey, too - 87mph
down the leg side - wide!
down the leg side and nudged off his hip
oh that's unfair. Batsman backed away to the leg side by about two feet so Anderson threw it a little wider, and it cut wider still. Harsh to be called a wide
drilled into the covers and well fielded
bashed out to the off side
another wide outside the off stump
better line, carved out to the off side
nice shot, cutting it hard out to the off side but Mascarenhas runs round from third man to make a fine stop

a great catch by Collingwood! He stepped to leg to give himself room and slapped it, mistiming it horribly, and Collingwood backtracked from cover to take it high above his head while tumbling backwards
goes inside out to drive this over extra cover. Swann fields on the rop
guided out to the off side
a one-handed fling over mid-off for four! Who needs two hands?
good comeback by Mascarenhas, cutting this back into the left-hander
pulled short of the deep square leg
very well timed, stroking it to point but straight to the fielder
that's a fine shot - stepping to leg and cutting it behind square, beating Wright's dive at backward point
passes by the left-hander this time! He really gave it everything but missed it completely
wellies it short of mid-on
way, way too short and Butt capitalises - uppercutting it over point for four! Great over this for Pakistan
pulled to mid-on
four more! A mistimed smudge over the leg side for another boundary
much better, fuller delivery, squeezed out to cover
clattered to mid-on
swings and misses outside the off stump
fabulous ball! Shapes back into the right-hander and beats him on the outside edge
flays this over point, high, high, high but not very handsome. Collingwood prevents four with a typically determined chase and effort
mistimed pull short of Wright at deep midwicket
another mistimed drive to mid-off
nice and full  - this is excellent bowling from Broad now. Squeezed out to the off side
goes on the pull - where's this gone? Lands safely on the leg side
short of a length, on the pull and this time he does find Wright at deep square leg - got him!
gone first ball! A quick bouncer, he went for a pull and skied it straight to Bopara at point
shorter ball which hurries onto the batsman, played off the back foot. Good stop to Rashid's right
shorter and straighter still, stroked out to long-on
flatter delivery on leg stump, flicked uppishly to square leg
squared up - nicely bowled, as the right-hander tries to whip him through midwicket but got a leading edge
good, tight ball on middle stump
pulled past short fine leg but deep square leg cleans up
stroked to long-on
gives it flight and all he can do is defend
full and fast, swept for four
again he goes for a sweep but it raps him on the pad
reverse swept to short third man
short of a length, chopped out to point
the googly, and he chops it out to the off side but lacks any power in it
defended out to the off side
nice leggie, pushed out to cover
gives himself a bit more room, cracking it hard out to Anderson on the deep extra-cover boundary
plays and misses outside off! Good take by Foster. Big, spinning legbreak
square-cut out to the off side
spins back hard and flicks it to leg
down the pitch and he tries to loft it over the infield, and in fact he does loft it over the infield
flatter ball outside off, swept down to fine leg
applause for Swann as it's another dot ball
comes down the pitch and chips it to long-on
worked off his pads - lots of shouting by England's fielders to get the ball back in and that's a really tight over by Swann
oh that's a top shot, sweeping it powerfully and over square leg
driven out to the off side
another fine shot. Too short from Rashid and he sweeps it from outside off with tremendous power. Such a short boundary on the leg side
beaten by turn, the ball bounding off his pad, and the throw comes in to Rashid's end but he's in front of the stumps. And they're home anyway
stopped by Collingwood out on the off side
driven uppishly out to the off side
faster ball, driven off the back foot
flicked to long-on. Good, straight delivery
tossed up but again he can only get a single, nudging it to leg
oh he's drilled this - absolutely scorched it back down the ground! He gave it everything
reverse-swept and Foster sees him coming - brilliant effort and I think he got his leg in the way to prevent four. Hmm - excellent work
stroked out to long-on - nearly a mix-up between the pair
ridiculous wide. Batsman steps to the off side, Wright sees him coming and thus sends it wider and he plays and misses. But it's wided. Really, really harsh!
carved down to third man - Morgan fields with athleticism
a wide on height. Wright's not happy. Nor is Ian Chappell, who's absolutely slamming these decisions
got him this time! Malik's feet were concreted and he flung his bat at this good-length outswinger, edging it behind
slams this first ball to a short mid-off. Brilliant stop by Collingwood
Afridi tries to slam this over midwicket - ha, he really did throw the kitchen sink at that! Missed it by miles
thick outside edge flying over cover - he was aiming to whack it over mid-on
a wide outside off - and it's not called a wide. Well, I don't know what's a wide and what isn't any more. Good over from Wright though
lovely legbreak on middle-and-leg, stroked to cover
a hugely spinning legbreak, Afridi tries to clout it over midwicket but is beaten by the turn
goes for a pull and top-edges it over the wicketkeeper's head - three fielders converge but no one can reach it
cracked out to Mascaremhas at deep extra cover
shorter ball, whipped to leg
stroked to cover to end a very, very impressive over
good-length ball on the off stump which is defended
another swing and a miss. Afridi is not the batsman he once was. He doesn't seem to be watching the ball, at all...
very full, driven with a thick outside edge down to third man
full toss but it's squeezed out for just two
full toss, slammed through extra cover! Timed that nicely, but Anderson's out on the boundary and has the best arm in the England team
another full toss - this one's been properly dispatched, clubbed through the leg-side. Bosh
Afridi's holed out to mid-on! A horrid swing and he mistimes it completely to Morgan who safely swallows it
swept to fine leg
nice and full, he clips it to long-on and walks a single
flogged over midwicket for a couple
swept on the bounce to square leg
short, pulled to square leg
that's a good, straight line just outside off and he defends
stands tall to defend on the back foot but is rushed into an edgy block to the leg side
driven to cover
wow - what a shot! He just planted his feet and flogged it for a flat six wide of long-on!
Bopara's dropped a dolly at point! He's blaming the lights, but really...
fast yorker with which to finish an entertaining over
tries to repeat the shot from the previous over but holes out to mid-on. Easy catch
a slower ball which comprehensively beats the batsman, who is fortunate that his drive lands safe behind the bowler's head
powerfully drives this fuller delivery out to long-off
nudged out to the off side for a suicidal single ... but somehow they get home!
a shorter and slower ball, he tries to pull it around the corner but can't time it
gorgeous drive - he goes inside out and times it quite beautifully. All too late now
no hat-trick this time, calmly guided to the off side
back-cut down to third man
full toss wanged through midwicket
steps to leg, Broad sends it down just outside off...and it's oddly left alone
a full toss which he bashes down the ground powerfully
got him! Great running catch by Wright, running to his right from mid-off to swallow a mis-timed slap
carved out wide of long-off - Swann gives chase, and rather feebly gives up on it.
a swing and a miss
and a swing and a miss once more
a very quick bouncer - much too quick for Gul
a wellied slap - horrible mistimed shot falls safe over the bowler's head
nudged to leg
